WorkItem.Description:

Shadowfang Keep (Heroic)

The following items are in the ItemCache but are not being captured by the appropriate filter:
  Throne of the Tides:
    [55262] Barnacle Pendant	(not found on wowhead)
    [55261] Ring of the Great Whale (not found on wowhead)
 
  Vortex Pinnacle
    [55853] Thundercall (Trash drop in Vortex Pinnacle -- note missing "The")
    [55855] Darksky Treads (Trash drop in Vortex Pinnacle -- note missing "The")

Comments.Message: While all the above are now present and captured by the correct filter, [65107] "Smite's Reaver" is now missing (it should be heroic deadmines loot).  I'm not sure if I missed this on my last pass or if it somehow got lost from the ItemCache.
